column5: Judging from how few posts there are on Canada, must not be many going up, at least for opener. A person will have the lake all to themselves. Must have either been too many guys bumped from going this year or too many DUI's over the winter.
the opener is the earliest possible this year. we have had a very cold spring and theres still some snow in the bush and frost in the ground. We're all getting a slow start.
